Tonto is fighting for democracy.  Since 2014, we already want to have free election for both the Legislative Council and our executive.  But we can't succeed at that time because the Communist Party only give us a chance.  I don't know, a filter.

Let go of them and try to back down and then we'll lose forever.  And there will be no more democracy or freedom in Hong Kong.

Yeah.
And they don't need the Western media to try to control their minds, pretty much.  Because Facebook is an American company.  I think everybody is an individual.  They have their own thoughts.
They can analyze things.  They can read from the outside but also from the inside to know which side they would like to be in.  And I don't think fighting for democracy would be hurting China.

You don't fear that if Hong Kong becomes a full democracy, that rich people can just buy the media, well, they already bought the media, sorry, they already have it, but they will be able to control, like in America.
I think that's why we need to have somebody to, like the media itself, it's the whole power.  They need to guide, they need to know that they are the individual.
